about_the_game:
AERO BATTLE ROYALE is the indie air racing game that throws you into the heart of exhilarating skies. Master the art of piloting high-performance aircraft in a stunning environment filled with breathtaking visuals and pulse-pounding races.

But this is no ordinary race. AERO BATTLE ROYALE throws a wrench or should we say, a missile into the mix by letting you unleash an arsenal of weapons on your opponents! Turn the skies into a battleground for ultimate air supremacy and be the last pilot standing.

Soar Solo or Squad Up: Take to the skies solo or team up with friends and family for epic online battles. AERO BATTLE ROYALE offers exciting gameplay for everyone, making it the perfect choice for a thrilling game night.




Clearer Headline: Captures the essence of the game (air racing + battle royale)
Stronger Introduction: Focuses on action and excitement.
Explains Weaponry: Highlights the unique "dogfight" aspect.
Family-Friendly Appeal: Mentions co-op play without sounding forced.
Call to Action: Encourages fans to follow for updates.

  • Processor: Apple M1, Apple M2, or Intel Core i5

name: AERO BATTLE ROYALE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 - 64bits
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X2 2.8 GHZ, Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450, Nvidia GeForce GT 460
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • VR Support:
  • Additional Notes: keyboard / mouse / controls
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 - 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core 5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Dominate the skies in breathtaking environments, battling opponents and mastering high-speed flight. Utilize your weapons and piloting skills to be the last pilot soaring!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Danish, Dutch, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Thai
